title: How do I make a conference call, and how do I switch between calls?
answer:
If you are talking on two calls using the same SIM card, you have the following options: 

 To switch between the two calls, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112759). 

 To start a conference call, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112760). (Note: This function is network-dependent. To use this function, contact your service provider and subscribe to the call hold service.)
